targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN status = 'HEALTHY' THEN 'üü¢ ' || status
        WHEN status = 'DEGRADED' THEN 'üü° ' || status
        ELSE 'üî¥ ' || status
    END as "Status",
    description as "Description",
    'Orchestrator: ' || ROUND(orchestrator_age_minutes::numeric, 1) || 'm ago' as "Orchestrator",
    agents_active || ' active' as "Agents",
    decisions_last_hour || '/hr' as "Decisions",
    signals_last_hour || '/hr' as "Signals"
FROM v_system_health
SELECT total_value FROM v_paper_portfolio_overview;
SELECT total_pnl as "Total PnL" FROM v_paper_portfolio_overview;
SELECT win_rate FROM v_paper_performance_metrics;
SELECT open_positions as "Open Positions" FROM v_paper_portfolio_overview;

SELECT 
  time,
  total_value as "Total Value",
  cash_balance as "Cash Balance",
  positions_value as "Positions Value"
FROM paper_portfolio_snapshots
WHERE time >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
ORDER BY time;

-- Historical prices (last 30 days)
SELECT 
  time,
  symbol || ' Historical' as metric,
  close as value
FROM ohlcv
WHERE time >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
  AND symbol IN ('BTC/USDT', 'ETH/USDT', 'SOL/USDT', 'AVAX/USDT')
ORDER BY time;

-- Base forecast (7 days ahead)
SELECT 
  forecast_time as time,
  symbol || ' Base Forecast' as metric,
  predicted_price as value
FROM price_forecasts
WHERE forecast_type = 'base'
  AND symbol IN ('BTC/USDT', 'ETH/USDT', 'SOL/USDT', 'AVAX/USDT')
  AND forecast_time >= NOW()
ORDER BY forecast_time;

-- Optimistic forecast
SELECT 
  forecast_time as time,
  symbol || ' Optimistic' as metric,
  predicted_price as value
FROM price_forecasts
WHERE forecast_type = 'optimistic'
  AND symbol IN ('BTC/USDT', 'ETH/USDT', 'SOL/USDT', 'AVAX/USDT')
  AND forecast_time >= NOW()
ORDER BY forecast_time;

-- Pessimistic forecast
SELECT 
  forecast_time as time,
  symbol || ' Pessimistic' as metric,
  predicted_price as value
FROM price_forecasts
WHERE forecast_type = 'pessimistic'
  AND symbol IN ('BTC/USDT', 'ETH/USDT', 'SOL/USDT', 'AVAX/USDT')
  AND forecast_time >= NOW()
ORDER BY forecast_time;

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN realized_pnl > 0 THEN 'Winning Trades'
    WHEN realized_pnl < 0 THEN 'Losing Trades'
    ELSE 'Breakeven'
  END as outcome,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM paper_trades
WHERE exit_time >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
GROUP BY outcome;

SELECT 
  time,
  total_pnl as "Total PnL"
FROM paper_portfolio_snapshots
WHERE time >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
ORDER BY time;

SELECT 
  total_trades as "Total Trades",
  winning_trades as "Wins",
  losing_trades as "Losses",
  win_rate as "Win Rate %",
  ROUND(sharpe_ratio::numeric, 2) as "Sharpe Ratio",
  ROUND(avg_pnl::numeric, 2) as "Avg PnL",
  ROUND(max_win::numeric, 2) as "Best Win",
  ROUND(max_loss::numeric, 2) as "Worst Loss",
  ROUND(avg_hold_hours::numeric, 1) as "Avg Hold (hrs)"
FROM v_paper_performance_metrics;

SELECT 
  symbol as "Symbol",
  asset_class as "Asset Class",
  ROUND(quantity::numeric, 4) as "Quantity",
  ROUND(entry_price::numeric, 2) as "Entry Price",
  ROUND(current_price::numeric, 2) as "Current Price",
  ROUND(unrealized_pnl::numeric, 2) as "Unrealized PnL",
  ROUND(unrealized_pnl_pct::numeric, 2) as "PnL %",
  hold_duration::text as "Hold Duration"
FROM v_paper_open_positions
ORDER BY unrealized_pnl DESC;

SELECT 
  symbol as "Symbol",
  ROUND(quantity::numeric, 4) as "Quantity",
  ROUND(entry_price::numeric, 2) as "Entry",
  ROUND(exit_price::numeric, 2) as "Exit",
  ROUND(net_pnl::numeric, 2) as "Net PnL",
  ROUND(realized_pnl_pct::numeric, 2) as "PnL %",
  outcome as "Outcome",
  hold_duration::text as "Duration",
  TO_CHAR(exit_time, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') as "Exit Time"
FROM v_paper_recent_trades
LIMIT 20;

SELECT 
  td.symbol as "Symbol",
  td.decision as "Decision",
  ROUND(td.confidence::numeric, 2) as "Confidence",
  ROUND(td.current_price::numeric, 2) as "Price",
  td.reasoning as "Reasoning",
  CASE 
    WHEN po.decision_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'Yes'
    ELSE 'No'
  END as "Executed",
  TO_CHAR(td.timestamp, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') as "Timestamp"
FROM trading_decisions td
LEFT JOIN paper_orders po ON td.id = po.decision_id
WHERE td.timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
ORDER BY td.timestamp DESC
LIMIT 30;

SELECT 
    TO_CHAR(timestamp AT TIME ZONE 'Australia/Brisbane', 'MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as "Timestamp",
    activity_type as "Type",
    component as "Component",
    status as "Status",
    description as "Action",
    details as "Details"
FROM v_system_activity
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 15

SELECT 
  TO_CHAR(prediction_time, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') as "Prediction Time",
  symbol as "Symbol",
  predicted_direction as "Predicted",
  ROUND(prediction_confidence::numeric, 2) as "Confidence",
  ROUND(price_at_prediction::numeric, 2) as "Price",
  actual_change_1h_pct as "1h %",
  actual_change_4h_pct as "4h %",
  actual_change_24h_pct as "24h %",
  outcome as "Outcome",
  executed as "Executed"
FROM v_prediction_vs_reality
LIMIT 20;

SELECT 
  agent_name || ' (' || symbol || ')' as "Agent",
  accuracy_pct as "Accuracy %",
  signal_count as "Signal Count",
  correct_predictions as "Correct",
  ROUND(avg_confidence::numeric, 2) as "Avg Confidence"
FROM v_agent_signal_accuracy
ORDER BY accuracy_pct DESC
LIMIT 15;

panels.title: Agent Signal Accuracy - Which Agents are Most Accurate?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  symbol as "Symbol",
  winning_trades as "Wins",
  losing_trades as "Losses",
  ROUND((winning_trades::numeric / NULLIF(winning_trades + losing_trades, 0))::numeric, 2) as "Win Rate",
  ROUND(avg_rsi_winning::numeric, 1) as "RSI (Win)",
  ROUND(avg_rsi_losing::numeric, 1) as "RSI (Loss)",
  ROUND(avg_macd_winning::numeric, 4) as "MACD (Win)",
  ROUND(avg_macd_losing::numeric, 4) as "MACD (Loss)",
  ROUND(avg_volume_winning::numeric, 2) as "Vol Ratio (Win)",
  ROUND(avg_volume_losing::numeric, 2) as "Vol Ratio (Loss)",
  ROUND(avg_confidence_winning::numeric, 2) as "Conf (Win)",
  ROUND(avg_confidence_losing::numeric, 2) as "Conf (Loss)",
  ROUND(avg_agents_agreeing_winning::numeric, 1) as "Agents (Win)",
  ROUND(avg_agents_agreeing_losing::numeric, 1) as "Agents (Loss)"
FROM v_lead_indicator_performance
ORDER BY winning_trades DESC;

panels.title: Lead Indicator Performance - What Predicts Winning vs Losing Trades?
